title: How important is food in your life? Do you eat to live or live to eat? - Quora

response.answer_text: Food is of course important in my life, in the sense it is for everyone. However, I don't love eating. I eat what I need to, and that's it. This is probably why I'm pretty skinny (I'm still at a healthy weight, no concerns of malnutrition). Another reason I don't eat a ton is because my stomache can't hold a ton of food. I eat the essentials, then other “yummy” foods, like cookies, but only if my stomache can hold it. So to answer your question, I eat to live, not the other way around.
